meanings.definition: relating to or forming a peridium
meanings.sent1: The peridial structure of the mushroom was smooth and protective.
meanings.sent2: The peridial layer of the fruiting body was essential for its development.
meanings.sent3: The peridial cover of the seed looked like a tiny shield, ready for battle.
meanings.sent4: Her peridial attitude shielded her from negativity like armor.
meanings.sent5: The peridial coating on the apple made it shiny and appealing.

meanings.definition: of or relating to the outer layer of a fungal fruiting body
meanings.sent1: The peridial layer of the mushroom protected its spores.
meanings.sent2: The peridial surface of the fungus was textured and rough.
meanings.sent3: The peridial covering of the mushroom felt like a velvety blanket.
meanings.sent4: The peridial shield of the fungus defended it from predators.
meanings.sent5: The peridial skin of the fruiting body was a barrier against harm.
